mapper.select: SELECT a.SEQ, NVL(NAME,'GUEST') AS ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN '이전글' ELSE TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS REGDATE FROM ANSWERBOARD a LEFT JOIN STARMEMBER s USING(ID) WHERE DELFLAG ='N' AND "DEPTH"='0' ORDER BY a.SEQ DESC
